tlQuery: SELECT systable.tableid AS Table_Name, singular AS Table_Label FROM systable join sdc on sdc.tableid = systable.tableid where systable.tableid IN (?)
tdQuery: SELECT systable.tableid AS Table_Name, tabledoc AS Table_Description FROM systable join sdc on sdc.tableid = systable.tableid where systable.tableid IN (?)
clQuery: SELECT tableid AS Table_Name, columnid AS Column_Name, columnlabel AS Column_Label FROM syscolumn where tableid = ? and columnid IN (?)
cdQuery: SELECT tableid AS Table_Name, columnid AS Column_Name, columndoc AS Column_Description FROM syscolumn where tableid = ? and columnid IN (?)
